data.text: @InspiredAquaCA @CPita3 Scott J Balsitis needs his Doctor's licence revoked for good. How did someone this ignorant of the facts become a Doctor? @DrScottBalsitis

@CPita3 I do not see the dis-truth here. The dis-truth seems to be S Baral's take on this?
I agree this has been blown out of proportion when other more pressing matters in the world, but it was
her card
her email account
her mother in law 
who she takes care of
Case closed
@CPita3 @AbundantLandUse I mean, the Calgary Herald opinion piece was a scandal in and of itself.
@InspiredAquaCA @CPita3 And disproven also by mathematical analysis, I believe. (There was a pretty devastating paper on this.)

@CPita3 LOL. Did I miss the part where Fulford said " I'm horrified my name is associated with this, because #COVIDisAirborne and vaccines are amazing, and it's urgent we protect our kids with masks and vaccines?"

And one more. The only thing shocking about this ordeal, is that Fulford is denying the association. She's not exactly been shy about her "COVID is over, masks don't work, vaccines aren't necessary for kids, let it rip" views.

https://t.co/c0lEq8qV3r

Here are her recent statements... not exactly a stretch to think this person is aligned with the Freedom Convoy:

https://t.co/kyWoIWWexL
